issue.title: [R] Write parquet files with compression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6532](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6532). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-6360. See ARROW-6216 for the C++ side. `write_parquet()` should be able to write compressed files, including with a specified compression level.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6532?focusedCommentId=16939676) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5451
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5451>
